metadata.title: ScentSational Showcase
metadata.description: Discover artisanal candles, wax figures, and gypsum products.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Explore our exquisite collection of handcrafted candles, unique wax figures, and elegant gypsum products.
homepage.ctaTitle: Crafted with Passion, Designed for You
homepage.ctaSubtitle: At ScentSational Showcase, we believe in the art of creation. Each piece is thoughtfully designed and meticulously crafted to bring warmth, beauty, and tranquility to your space.
